title: WTB: Sweet Caporal with Factory 30 Gutter Mark
author: rp12367

posts.post_title: WTB: Sweet Caporal with Factory 30 Gutter Mark
posts.post_content: I am looking to buy a Sweet Cap w/factory 30 gutter mark (stamp, which shows part of the 30, in bottom border) any player any grade, raw or slabbed. Please e-mail/PM scan and price info. Thanks in advance. Ralph [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]
